text: The Polytechnic Institute of Paris (French: Institut polytechnique de Paris) is an engineering graduate school in France.A Saclay, le pôle d'écoles autour de Polytechnique se voit parmi les premiers mondiaux d'ici à 2030 Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur IP Paris (IP Paris Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Masters Recherche & Doctorat (PhD doctorate studies ) * Mastères Spécialisés (MS) * Massive Online Open Course Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at Institut polytechnique de Paris.E. Labaye (IP Paris) : "Si nous voulons être aussi performant que le MIT ou l’EPFL, il nous faut intensifier notre force de frappe" On September 15, 2020, the Institute co-founded with HEC ParisHi!Paris, L’Institut Polytechnique De Paris Et HEC Paris Affichent Leur Ambition Dans L’IA the artificial intelligence research center Hi! PARIS.Zoom sur Hi! PARIS, le centre consacré à l’IA et aux Sciences des données de l’Institut Polytechnique de Paris et HEC ParisHEC et Polytechnique lancent le centre pluridisciplinaire Hi! Paris pour devenir champions de la recherche en IA Most of the 6900 graduate engineer students at Institut polytechnique de Paris live in dedicated residential buildings nearby research labs and metro public transports. == Research labs == Research activities at Institut polytechnique de Paris relate to the following topics:Comment fonctionnera l’Institut Polytechnique de Paris * Energy and Climate * Digital * Safety * Technologies * Health. == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:2019 establishments in France
title: Polytechnic Institute of Paris
